anya-e1215n0:23_0: Savaṇā lapanā ceva satiyā cāpi vandanā,
anya-e1215n0:29_0: Yo lokatilako nātho pūretvā dasa pāramī,
anya-e1215n0:32_0: Ārādhito surādīhi kālo mārisa te ayaṃ,
anya-e1215n0:35_0: Etadatthāya te vīra pūritā dasa pāramī,
anya-e1215n0:36_0: Bāhuṃ pitussa putto’va loko ālambate tuvaṃ;
anya-e1215n0:38_0: Tesaṃ taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā mahāsatto mahāmatī,
anya-e1215n0:50_0: Janānaṃ nīlanettehi vadanehi tu yā purī,
anya-e1215n0:98_0: Nivedetvā tamatthaṃ sā rañño tena susajjite,
anya-e1215n0:113_0: Brahmāno lokapālā ca manussā kamato tadā,
anya-e1215n0:116_0: Mahiṃ patiṭṭhito dhīro passitvāna tato disā,
anya-e1215n0:128_0: Dibbehi rūpasaddehi gandhehi ca rasehi ca,
anya-e1215n0:135_0: Dassetvā’sesasippaṃ taṃ loke vijjati yaṃ tadā;
anya-e1215n0:137_0: Ñātisaṅghaṃ pamodento deve ca manuje’pi ca,
anya-e1215n0:165_0: Sasī’va dassanīyo ca sūriyo viya tejavā;
anya-e1215n0:201_0: Vajjanti bheriyo tāsu paggayha kāci nāriyo;
anya-e1215n0:204_0: Dhamanti susiraṃ kāci kāci vādenti tantiyo;
anya-e1215n0:212_0: Disvāna so tamacchariyaṃ viratto visaye tadā,
anya-e1215n0:219_0: Iccevaṃ cintayanto so supantova sayī tahiṃ;
anya-e1215n0:222_0: So’yaṃ’dāni supī’ amhe kassadāni karoma taṃ?;
anya-e1215n0:224_0: Iti cintiya te tattha turiyesu sake sake,
anya-e1215n0:227_0: Khādanti kāci dantāni kāci lālā vahantiyo,
anya-e1215n0:230_0: Kākacchanti’pi semhampi gilanti ca camanti ca,
anya-e1215n0:231_0: Karonti nādaṃ nāsāya gharū’ti ca khipanti ca;
anya-e1215n0:233_0: Muttayanti tadā kāci rahassaṃ vicaranti ca,
anya-e1215n0:234_0: Duggandhaṃ vāti taṃ ṭhānaṃ susānaṃ āmakaṃ yathā;
anya-e1215n0:237_0: Addakkhi tāsaṃ nekāni vikārāni tahiṃ tadā;
anya-e1215n0:252_0: Buddho hutvāpi’maṃ sakkā passituṃ iti cintiya;
anya-e1215n0:254_0: Gato nātho tato ṭhānā bodhiyā baddhamānaso
anya-e1215n0:255_0: Tadahevāsi buddhoti kāmuko ko na cintaye;
anya-e1215n0:279_0: Pasatto tattha turago dukkhato agamī tadā;
anya-e1215n0:284_0: Tīraṭṭho passi so dhīro gaṅgānāriṃ rasāvahaṃ,
anya-e1215n0:290_0: Pabbajituṃ mayettheva yuttaṃ no me papañcituṃ,
anya-e1215n0:297_0: Tiṭṭhatu gagane gantvā iti ukkhipi ca’mbaraṃ;
anya-e1215n0:302_0: Kāretvā maṇithūpaṃ so nīdhetvā taṃ siroruhaṃ,
anya-e1215n0:308_0: Pubbe viyambaraṃ gayha ambare khipi nāyako,
anya-e1215n0:309_0: Paṭiggahetvā taṃ brahmā netvā brahmapuraṃ caraṃ;
anya-e1215n0:317_0: Tato ambavanaṃ gantvā vindanto pītijaṃ sukhaṃ,
anya-e1215n0:327_0: Disvā evaṃ vicintesuṃ nāyaṃ yo so janādhipo;
anya-e1215n0:332_0: Sutvāna taṃ tadā keci hasantā vacanantaraṃ,
anya-e1215n0:333_0: Nāyaṃ sasī sasaṅekā so bhānumeso’ti no mati;
anya-e1215n0:338_0: Kiṃ bho ummattakā attha evaṃ mā vadathā’dhunā,
anya-e1215n0:339_0: Sataraṃsī uṇharaṃsī na so eso aviggaho;
anya-e1215n0:342_0: Sarūpena na no atthi saṃsayo balu mānase;
anya-e1215n0:344_0: Tesaṃ taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā hasantā keci jantuno,
anya-e1215n0:345_0: Tumhe khalū na jānātha sabāṇe sadhanū hi so;
anya-e1215n0:348_0: Kelāso iti sampatto jahātha vimatiṃ idha;
anya-e1215n0:350_0: Tesampi vacanaṃ sutvā hasanteke janā tadā,
anya-e1215n0:351_0: Nāyaṃ haro tinetto so kesaveso idhāgato;
anya-e1215n0:354_0: Vesenaññena maññāma ettha no natthi saṃsayo;
anya-e1215n0:356_0: Paharitvā karaṃ keci sutvā taṃ vacanaṃ narā,
anya-e1215n0:357_0: Hasantevaṃ tadāvocuṃ vāsudevo na ve ayaṃ;
anya-e1215n0:363_0: Passitunti paṭiññāto mā bhonto vilapantu ve;
anya-e1215n0:365_0: Sutvā tesaṃ giraṃ keci keḷiṃ katvāna nekadhā,
anya-e1215n0:366_0: Tumhe sakkaṃ na jānātha so hi bho vajirāyudho;
anya-e1215n0:368_0: Eso hi bho mahābrahmā brahmalokā idhāgato,
anya-e1215n0:369_0: Pamattā kinnu vedamhī brahmabandhu pure idha;
anya-e1215n0:372_0: Nete candādayo kāmaṃ mā mohaṃ bho pakāsatha;
anya-e1215n0:380_0: Evaṃ vadantā sabbe te nāgarā purisuttamaṃ,
anya-e1215n0:384_0: Jantavo mananāvāyo pāraṃ passiṃsu no tadā;
anya-e1215n0:395_0: Amataṃ viya taṃ bhutvā vikkhāletvā mukhaṃ dakā,
anya-e1215n0:396_0: Patte vattaṃ caritvāna muhuttaṃ tattha vissami;
anya-e1215n0:408_0: Pakāsetvāna lokassa mokkhaṃ natthiti tena so;
anya-e1215n0:416_0: Tadā senāni nigame sujātā khīra dāyikā,
anya-e1215n0:422_0: Yathā mayhaṃ mahādeva iddhā patthita patthanā,
anya-e1215n0:425_0: Iti vatvāna vanditvā katvā ca naṃ padakkhiṇaṃ,
anya-e1215n0:435_0: Disvāna supine pañca atthaṃ tesaṃ vicintiya;
anya-e1215n0:447_0: Tato mahiṃ dvidhā katvā samuṭṭhāsi mahāsanaṃ;
anya-e1215n0:452_0: Kāmaṃ taco nahārū ca aṭṭhi ca avasissatu,
anya-e1215n0:455_0: Na uṭṭhahāmabujjhitvā na jahe vīriyaṃ mama,
anya-e1215n0:516_0: Nāgatā neva vāhesuṃ sabbe etthe’va osaṭā;
anya-e1215n0:519_0: Nāgādayo na dhutāsuṃ ketunaṃ bahu kā kathā;
anya-e1215n0:522_0: Tārakā gagane brūmo kinnu tattha dhajālutā;
anya-e1215n0:540_0: Nosīnā dharaṇī bhārā disebhānaṃ balaṃ aho;
anya-e1215n0:560_0: Kañcanādāsahatthā ca kācī kaññā tathā ṭhitā,
anya-e1215n0:563_0: Kāci maṅgala saṃyutta vacanā tava patthanā,
anya-e1215n0:569_0: Naccanti keci kīḷanti selenti ca lalanti ca,
anya-e1215n0:570_0: Vādenti keci gāyanti velukkhepaṃ karonti ca;
anya-e1215n0:594_0: Pūjāvisesaṃ taṃ ko hi mukhenekena bhāsatī;
anya-e1215n0:597_0: Dasakaṇṭho’pi taṃ sabbaṃ neva sakkonti bhāsituṃ;
anya-e1215n0:602_0: Tasmintu vāsare māro passitvā bhuvanaṃ idaṃ,
anya-e1215n0:605_0: Sabbe dibbavimānā bho suññā dissanti chaḍḍitā,
anya-e1215n0:608_0: Kimbho māra na jānāsi matto sutto’si ajja kiṃ,
anya-e1215n0:612_0: Bodhimule nisinno si ajja buddho bhavāmīti;
anya-e1215n0:617_0: Kinnu te badhiraṃ sotaṃ kinnu parihāyi locanaṃ,
anya-e1215n0:618_0: Dhajaggā te na dissanti ullolaṃ te na sūyati;
anya-e1215n0:620_0: Tesaṃ taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā antako khalu pāpimā,
anya-e1215n0:624_0: Asāro khalu saṃsāro siddhatthe vibhavaṃ gate;
anya-e1215n0:629_0: Nirālokaṃ tilokaṃ bho asuraṃ vāsaraṃ yathā,
anya-e1215n0:638_0: Māpetha bheravaṃ vaṇṇaṃ bībhacchaṃ duddasaṃ kharaṃ,
anya-e1215n0:641_0: Tassa taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā mārasenā samāgamuṃ,
anya-e1215n0:647_0: Disvāna durato ettaṃ devā māraṃ savāhiniṃ,
anya-e1215n0:650_0: Saṃkhippa khippaṃ sacchattaṃ brahmā dhāvi parammukho,
anya-e1215n0:651_0: Katvāna piṭṭhiyaṃ saṅkhaṃ sakko dhāvi visaṅkito;
anya-e1215n0:669_0: Andhakāraṃ disā āsuṃ dhūmaketu ca ambare;
anya-e1215n0:684_0: Na yuttañhi gajo yāti gajaṃ no yāti kotthukaṃ;
anya-e1215n0:686_0: Netaṃ garu palāpetuṃ kālo iti vicintiya,
anya-e1215n0:708_0: Cāletuṃ neva so sakkhi aṃsumattampi cīvare;
anya-e1215n0:714_0: Niccaṃ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṃ sadā;
anya-e1215n0:720_0: Hotu dāni mahoghena pavāhemi imaṃ yatiṃ,
anya-e1215n0:736_0: Mahābhīma nabho bherissanā āsuṃ tahiṃ tahiṃ;
anya-e1215n0:751_0: Niccaṃ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṃ sadā;
anya-e1215n0:757_0: Bhavatajja kimetena māraṇe tassa kiṃ garu,
anya-e1215n0:760_0: Iti cintiya so māro māpetvāṅgāra vuṭṭhiyo,
anya-e1215n0:782_0: Niccaṃ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṃ sadā;
anya-e1215n0:786_0: Dukkhito dummano hutvā evaṃ cintesi dummati;
anya-e1215n0:804_0: Niccaṃ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṃ sadā;
anya-e1215n0:820_0: Niccaṃ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṃ sadā;
anya-e1215n0:823_0: Taṃ disvā pāpimā kuddho yaṃ yaṃ tassa karoma’haṃ,
anya-e1215n0:824_0: Taṃ taṃ’dānī na sakkoti kiñci kākumu’pakkamaṃ;
anya-e1215n0:836_0: Niccaṃ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṃ sadā;
anya-e1215n0:839_0: Tato disvāna taṃ kaṇho kaṇhasenā purakkhato,
anya-e1215n0:840_0: Saṅkuddho pesayi tattha vassaṃ so sikatāmayaṃ;
anya-e1215n0:849_0: Niccaṃ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṃ sadā;
anya-e1215n0:855_0: Iti cintiya māpetvā pesesi palipaṃ ghanaṃ,
anya-e1215n0:856_0: Dhūpāyanto pajjalanto gantvā so nabhasā lahuṃ;
anya-e1215n0:865_0: Niccaṃ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṃ sadā;
anya-e1215n0:871_0: Mayhaṃ bhāroti cintetvā māpesi timiraṃ ghanaṃ;
anya-e1215n0:874_0: Gantvāna gaganā so hi patvāna munisantikaṃ;
anya-e1215n0:883_0: Niccaṃ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṃ sadā;
anya-e1215n0:886_0: Evaṃ navahi vuṭṭhihi katvā māro mahā bhavaṃ,
anya-e1215n0:895_0: Tatheva so mahiṃ kuddho māro khipati vegavā,
anya-e1215n0:898_0: Tatheva kupito tena khipate so mahambudhiṃ,
anya-e1215n0:899_0: Vilayaṃ jalajā yanti sussate so mahaṇṇavo;
anya-e1215n0:908_0: Niccaṃ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṃ sadā;
anya-e1215n0:911_0: Iti kopagginā dittamanaṃ māraṃ tadā jino,
anya-e1215n0:914_0: Evaṃ katvāpi so kuddho aladdhavijayo tadā,
anya-e1215n0:923_0: Athagā saha vācāhi bhiṃsā sā māravāhinī,
anya-e1215n0:942_0: Bhujaṅge ca guṇe keci gāḷhamākaḍḍhayanti ca;
anya-e1215n0:957_0: Gattena rakkhasā hutvā keci dhāvanti kiṅakarā;
anya-e1215n0:971_0: Gilantā keci phaṇino uggirantā tatheva ca,
anya-e1215n0:972_0: Sīsa kandhara kaṇṇanta bāhu aṅguli ādisu;
anya-e1215n0:981_0: Lālayantā sakā jivhā khandhe katvāna muggare,
anya-e1215n0:993_0: Yaṃ diṭṭha suta mattena maraṇaṃ citta vibbhamaṃ,
anya-e1215n0:994_0: Yāti loko kathaṃ ko taṃ nissesaṃ bhāsate naro;
anya-e1215n0:1011_0: Sahassabāhuṃ māpetvā chūrikā yaṭṭhi satti ca,
anya-e1215n0:1021_0: Āvahanto bhayaṃ brahma sura siddhādīnaṃ tadā,
anya-e1215n0:1030_0: Akampo so munī evamagge’kāsi nijaṃ balaṃ,
anya-e1215n0:1049_0: Suṇātha bho giraṃ mayhaṃ bhavatajja mahā bhavo;
anya-e1215n0:1051_0: Etha yātha samaggattha na ossakkatha sujjhatha,
anya-e1215n0:1054_0: Ajja gacchati niṭṭhānaṃ so bho pāramitābhaṭā,
anya-e1215n0:1057_0: Atha dānabhaṭo āha apphoṭaṃ diguṇaṃ bhujaṃ,
anya-e1215n0:1061_0: Ubho passe karitvāna saseno dhāvi dappavā;
anya-e1215n0:1073_0: Sosemi mama tejena vadaṃ’gā māra sāgaraṃ;
anya-e1215n0:1082_0: Nisidi tassa tejena nirussāhāsi sā camū;
anya-e1215n0:1084_0: Aho bho vimhayaṃ dāni suṇātha munino mama,
anya-e1215n0:1088_0: Aduṭṭho jeti sambuddho ānubhāvo hi tādiso;
anya-e1215n0:1091_0: Nirāyudho’va taṃ jeti ānubhāvo hi tādiso;
anya-e1215n0:1094_0: Niccalo jeti sambuddho ānubhāvo hi tādiso;
anya-e1215n0:1097_0: Nisinnova jino jeti ānubhāvo hi tādiso;
anya-e1215n0:1100_0: Nissaddo jeti sambuddho ānubhāvo hi tādiso;
anya-e1215n0:1106_0: Khippaṃ siddhattha he gaccha santakedaṃ mamāsanaṃ;
anya-e1215n0:1108_0: No ce gacchasi te hadayaṃ phālemi nakhasattihi,
anya-e1215n0:1111_0: Passa me mahatiṃ senaṃ passa āyudhasañcayaṃ,
anya-e1215n0:1112_0: Tena taṃ abhimaddāmi tuvaṭaṃ gacchidaṃ mama;
anya-e1215n0:1115_0: Kadā te pūritā māra pallaṅkatthāya pāramī;
anya-e1215n0:1117_0: Kadā adāsi sīsādī dānaṃ sīlaṃ kathaṃ tava,
anya-e1215n0:1120_0: Athā’ha pharuso māro netaṃ garu mune mama,
anya-e1215n0:1121_0: Ayaṃ sā parisā sabbā tassa paccakkhakārakaṃ;
anya-e1215n0:1126_0: Athāha māro samaṇa ahaṃ sakkhi kathāpayiṃ,
anya-e1215n0:1127_0: Tava ko sakkhi yajjatthi kathāpehi lahuṃ mama;
anya-e1215n0:1129_0: Athāha bhagavā tassa gambhīraṃ madhuraṃ giraṃ,
anya-e1215n0:1132_0: Taveva me na santīdha paccakkhatthaṃ sacetanā,
anya-e1215n0:1135_0: Iti vatvāna mārāri sañtdhā jimūta gabbhato,
anya-e1215n0:1162_0: Aṅguliyo mukhe keci pakkhipanti rudanti ca,
anya-e1215n0:1163_0: Keci vandanti yāvanti abhayaṃ sāmi dehi no;
anya-e1215n0:1171_0: Taṅkaṇe uggato āsi satthu kitti jayaddhajo,
anya-e1215n0:1178_0: Niccaṃ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṃ sadā;
anya-e1215n0:1184_0: Devā te nikhilā netvā nānāpūjāvidhiṃ tato,
anya-e1215n0:1194_0: Dhamentā viya saṅkhāni kūjenti madhuraṃ giraṃ;
anya-e1215n0:1212_0: Āsavānaṃ khaye ñāṇā laddhā aggaphalaṃ tadā;
anya-e1215n0:1220_0: Gahakāraka diṭṭhosi puna gehaṃ na kāhasi,
anya-e1215n0:1221_0: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā gahakūṭaṃ visaṅkhitaṃ,
anya-e1215n0:1232_0: Pāpārayo ca vijito sa dadātu santiṃ;
anya-e1215n0:1349_0: Hā tāta hā tāta kimāsi tedaṃ
anya-e1215n0:1350_0: Naṭṭhannu te kiṃ vada patthasī kiṃ,
anya-e1215n0:1526_0: Giriṃ nakhena khaṇatha ayo dantehi khādatha;
anya-e1215n0:1823_0: Tvaṃ ko’si re! Iti paro aparaṃ kharena
anya-e1215n0:1842_0: Muḷhā disañca vidisaṃ na vidiṃsu bhītā,
anya-e1215n0:1874_0: Ogamma tattha puthu patthari camma kaṇḍaṃ;
anya-e1215n0:1893_0: Tasmimpi te pavisituṃ saraṇaṃ na laddhā
anya-e1215n0:1919_0: Lokagga puggala varaṃ dada sāmi dhīsa;
anya-e1215n0:1923_0: Tumhe vinā khaṇalavaṃ vasituṃ na icche
anya-e1215n0:1933_0: Katvā’tha so vara mahaṃ tidivehi saddhi
anya-e1215n0:1974_0: Magge phale ca saraṇe ca patiṭṭhahiṃsu
anya-e1215n0:2014_0: Atha ca duhituyā so dīyamānaṃ dadanto
anya-e1215n0:2050_0: Sumana sumana nāmaṃ passi devaṃ samiddhiṃ;
anya-e1215n0:2105_0: Thuti mukhara mukhā tā sādhu kīḷaṃ akaṃsu;
anya-e1215n0:2107_0: Atha muni uragānaṃ viggahaṃ taṃ sametuṃ
anya-e1215n0:2112_0: Na bho bho saṃsāre khalu bhavati sāraṃ lavampi
anya-e1215n0:2113_0: Visesā taṃ sītaṃ jalita dahane vijjati kadā,
anya-e1215n0:2114_0: Sadā rāgaṃ rogaṃ byadhati janataṃ nekaduritaṃ
anya-e1215n0:2117_0: Sarīro’yaṃ battiṃsa vidha kuṇapo sāra rahito
anya-e1215n0:2120_0: Athevaṃ sante bho varayati bhavaṃ ko nu hi budho;
anya-e1215n0:2124_0: Phaṇī majjāro sā guhaka kapayo bhūya bahuso
anya-e1215n0:2127_0: Pure kāko’lukā atha vanabhavā phandana isā
anya-e1215n0:2132_0: Balaṃ bālānaṃ bho saka saka vadhāyeva bhavati
anya-e1215n0:2134_0: Gajaṃ bālaṃ mattaṃ pavidhi na balaṃ hoti saraṇaṃ
anya-e1215n0:2135_0: Athaṭṭhāne kiṃ bho kurutha vīriyaṃ bhuti hananaṃ;
anya-e1215n0:2137_0: Na dukkhaṃ tesaṃ ye vigata kalahā ekamanasā
anya-e1215n0:2138_0: Atīte bho lāpā aghaṭita mānā peyyavacanā,
anya-e1215n0:2139_0: Sukhaṃ vāsaṃ’kāsuṃ yadahani bhavuṃ te’tha vidhurā
anya-e1215n0:2144_0: Atha muditamanā te pīṇitā tassa nāgā
anya-e1215n0:2148_0: Taruṇa raviva tasmiṃ āsane āsi bhāsaṃ,
anya-e1215n0:2162_0: Yadi sugata! Imaṃ tvaṃ nāgato assa ṭhānaṃ
anya-e1215n0:2165_0: Pasami dahana dittaṃ ambudeneva taṃ tvaṃ;
anya-e1215n0:2173_0: Yadi manasi dayā te hoti dāse punā’pi,
anya-e1215n0:2180_0: Sa sumana taru rājaṃ pūjanatthaṃ vidhāya;
anya-e1215n0:2185_0: Dadati iti ca vatvā ovaditvāna satthā;
anya-e1215n0:2293_0: Yo neka kappa sata sañcita puññarāsi
anya-e1215n0:2296_0: Ko tattha bhuti matulaṃ kathiko katheti;
anya-e1215n0:2315_0: Ñatvā taṃ sumano nāgo lahumāgamma sīhalaṃ,
anya-e1215n0:2321_0: Datvā tulādayo sesa mandiraṅge tatheva ca,
anya-e1215n0:2328_0: Soṇṇa kiṅkiṇi mālāyo kaṇṇamālā ca māpiya;
anya-e1215n0:2351_0: Sañcinitvāna te nāgā khajja bhojja phalāphale,
anya-e1215n0:2354_0: Tato kāruṇiko nātho bodhito aṭṭhame same,
anya-e1215n0:2387_0: Sāsanodaya selagge sūriyo viya bhāti yo,
anya-e1215n0:2391_0: Pākaṭo bhuvane so’pi gato sambuddha santikaṃ;
anya-e1215n0:2441_0: Tato sambuddha dehasmā nikkhantāsuṃ cha raṃsiyo,
anya-e1215n0:2466_0: Uggantvā parato yantī nīra nijjhara sannībhā;
anya-e1215n0:2469_0: Kārayantā sakaṃ vaṇṇaṃ dhāvantā’pi ca sindhavo;
anya-e1215n0:2490_0: Yāti kiṃ buhmalokannu amhākaṃ bhavanannu kho;
anya-e1215n0:2499_0: Yāvamānā jinaṃ keci tiṭṭhanti ca mahanti ca;
anya-e1215n0:2513_0: Yesaṃ yesaṃ manasmiṃ yaṃ yamatthi kiñci saṃsayaṃ,
anya-e1215n0:2514_0: Tesaṃ taṃ taṃ paṇudento desanāya sudhāsinaṃ;
anya-e1215n0:2520_0: Paṭimaggaṃ karontā te tattha tattha mahāmahaṃ;
anya-e1215n0:2525_0: Ye passanti jinaṃ tattha sasissaṃ siriyā jalaṃ,
anya-e1215n0:2528_0: Ye suṇanti tadā dhammaṃ dhammissara pabhāvitaṃ,
anya-e1215n0:2529_0: Suladdhā tehi sotāni tesaṃ sotāni sotakā;
anya-e1215n0:2532_0: Suladdhā tehi ve jivhā tesaṃ jivhā rasaññakā
anya-e1215n0:2534_0: Ye vandanti jinaṃ yantaṃ sasaṅghaṃ gaganaṅgane,
anya-e1215n0:2535_0: Suladdhā tehi hatthāni tesaṃyeva bhujā bhujā;
anya-e1215n0:2537_0: Tadā tathāgataṃ disvā ye santuṭṭhā tathāgataṃ,
anya-e1215n0:2538_0: Tathāgatānaṃ sabbesaṃ yo toso hotu sabbadā;
anya-e1215n0:2543_0: Tato gaṅgā manuññañhi sampattaṃ taṃ saputtakaṃ,
anya-e1215n0:2549_0: Tato so yācito satthā nāgasaṅghehi vandiya,
anya-e1215n0:2555_0: Tato bhikkhu nisīdiṃsu patta pattāsane tadā,
anya-e1215n0:2562_0: Nettinda maṇināvāhi pāraṃ gantuṃ na te pabhu;
anya-e1215n0:2564_0: Tato sasaṅghaṃ sugataṃ sajano maṇi akkhiko,
anya-e1215n0:2578_0: Maggā janā khalu labhanti kadā patiṭṭhaṃ,
anya-e1215n0:2583_0: Jātī jarā maraṇa dukkha pariddavā ca
anya-e1215n0:2594_0: Rūpe na rajjatha tato khalu sādhupaññā;
anya-e1215n0:2636_0: Evaṃ saddhammamaggaṃ varamati sugato desayi pannagānaṃ
anya-e1215n0:2637_0: Sutvā te sampahaṭṭhā mahamahamakaruṃ nijjarādīhi saddhiṃ,
anya-e1215n0:2638_0: Tesaṃ ve desanāyaṃ suraviṭapi samā sātthikā tattha jātā
anya-e1215n0:2639_0: So nātho tañca dhammaṃ bhagavati tanayā te ca vo pālayantu
anya-e1215n0:2719_0: Madhuka vaṭa kareri bodhi jambīra bhalli
anya-e1215n0:2757_0: Siddhā ca siddhavanitā hi tahiṃ tahiṃ te
anya-e1215n0:2763_0: Gokaṇṇa salla sasa jambuka sūkarā ca,
anya-e1215n0:2773_0: Cakkavha kīra kurarā kulalā ca kaṅkā,
anya-e1215n0:2789_0: Kāsātha sopi muni tassa vacaṃ paṭicca
anya-e1215n0:2802_0: Gacchante gaganāyanena sugate bhānu’si santo tadā
anya-e1215n0:2803_0: Vāresuṃ sūriyātapañca jaladā siñjiṃsu bhumyā jalaṃ,
anya-e1215n0:2804_0: Mandāmanda sugandha muddha pavano pāpeti sitaṃ sukhaṃ,
anya-e1215n0:2805_0: Devādi dhaja chatta cāmarakarā pūjenti mānenti ca;
anya-e1215n0:3032_0: Evaṃ so dhammarājā janahitavihito vīta dosārivaggo
anya-e1215n0:3034_0: Taṃ vo saggā’pavaggaṃ dadati munisamaṃ citta matte pasanne
anya-e1215n0:3035_0: Tasmā bho!Bho! Pahaṭṭhā namatha mahatha taṃ sādhu sādhuppasatthaṃ;
anya-e1215n0:3040_0: Tatheva sādhū saṅakappā khippaṃ pappontu pāṇinaṃ;
anya-e1215n0:3051_0: Tassa sisso’si yo vippagāma vaṃseka ketuko
